body_html:
@whydoyoumakeitsohard - Hi, try installing Microsoft Visual C++ 2015 Redistributable Update 3 and see if you are running into this error.
Please try with CUDA9 and cuDNN 7.0.5.
Also I encourage you to check the below post and see if you are facing the similar issue. Thank you !
Install TF on Windows
body_text:
@whydoyoumakeitsohard  - Hi, try installing Microsoft Visual C++ 2015 Redistributable Update 3 and see if you are running into this error.

Install TF on Windows
body:
@whydoyoumakeitsohard  - Hi, try installing Microsoft Visual C++ 2015 Redistributable Update 3 and see if you are running into this error.
Please try with CUDA9 and cuDNN 7.0.5. 
Also I encourage you to check the below post and see if you are facing the similar issue. Thank you !
[Install TF on Windows](https://www.pugetsystems.com/labs/hpc/The-Best-Way-to-Install-TensorFlow-with-GPU-Support-on-Windows-10-Without-Installing-CUDA-1187/)
